Blogs

Welcome to our blog section where we share insights, ideas, and updates on various topics related to AI, ML, self-adaptive, and sustainable systems.

POSEIDON: A New Direction in Managing MEC Networks

POSEIDON combines Deep Reinforcement Learning and traditional optimization techniques to improve MEC network management.

Published on October 23, 2024
Author: Prakhar Jain, Prakhar Singhal, and Divyansh Pandey
